name: vscode-cosmosdb
description: Connect to MongoDB, Mongo Clusters, CosmosDB and other databases in and outside of Azure, inspect and edit your data and run powerful queries with the visual query editor.
//enableMongoClusters: Notifies Azure Resources extension to enable Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB (vCore) in the tree view.
//enableDocumentDBExtensionIntegration: Notifies Azure Databases extension to enable DocumentDB extension integration.

scripts.package:win32: npm run webpack-prod && cd dist && npm pkg delete "scripts.vscode:prepublish" && npx vsce package --no-dependencies --out ../%npm_package_name%-%npm_package_version%.vsix
scripts.package:default: npm run webpack-prod && cd dist && npm pkg delete "scripts.vscode:prepublish" && npx vsce package --no-dependencies --out ../${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.vsix
scripts.webpack-dev: rimraf ./dist && npm run webpack-dev-ext && npm run webpack-dev-wv
scripts.webpack-prod: rimraf ./dist && npm run webpack-prod-ext && npm run webpack-prod-wv
scripts.resapi.resetall: rimraf out node_modules dist && npm install && npm run resapi.link
scripts.l10n:auto: cross-env AZURE_TRANSLATOR_KEY= cross-env AZURE_TRANSLATOR_REGION= npx @vscode/l10n-dev generate-azure --outDir ./l10n ./l10n/bundle.l10n.json ./package.nls.json

commands.//: Mongo DB|Cluster Scrapbook Execute All Commands
commands.title: %cosmosdb.command.mongo.scrapbook.execute_all%

view/item/context.//: [Account] CosmosDB | MongoDB | Cluster Copy connection string
